text:
Hello everyone, we are looking for someone with experiance in building themes and blocks in the CMS to join our team, we also develop in WP and Shopify. This is a global position, you can apply from any country. There will be preferences for NY time zone or similar.
If you are interested please add a comment “HubSpot Developers Slack” in your message
<https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01ce4c7763d1a705d3>
